name: Time Waits for No One
descHash:
She had spent many days next to the window.

Flowers were blooming outside when she made gentle medicines with mint and nepeta.
Rain was falling outside when she made strong medicines with mosla and ginger.
Leaves were falling outside when she made sour medicines with peony roots and dry plums.
And snow was falling outside when she made bitter medicines with skullcaps and anemarrhena.

Time flows endlessly, but this window and the person sitting next to it remain forever the same.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549438.name: Extinguished Core
549438.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
549438.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster.

"Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: One half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

633379.name: Glimmering Core
633379.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Normal material used for enhancement.
633379.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is glimmering and the veins on it indicate it's still alive.

"What kind of monster is this? Did you see it... Its face! It has the face of our previous leader!"
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

635671.name: Seed of Abundance
635671.desc: A seed of blessing sown by the Aeon of Abundance. Used to level up Traces slightly for Abundance characters.
635671.lore:
Those who come in contact with it are slowly healed of their wounds and illnesses.
People who pray for the blessing of life while in despair will always have their prayers answered.

"You shall be granted what you ask for."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

836257.name: Flower of Eternity
836257.desc: A gorgeous flower blooming from the Sprout of Life. Used to level up Traces significantly for Abundance characters.
836257.lore:
The stamen contains the concentrated power of the Path of Abundance, ensuring the flower's ever-lasting vitality. No fire, ice, or any harshness can hinder the growth of this magnificent life form.
Given time, its leaves shall feed upon starlight. Its roots shall burrow into the flesh of every being of this world, all-connected, never-perishing. Its fruits shall fulfill the promise of immortality.

"There be giant ships, eclipsing mountains, drifting over the void. Upon them grows the undying tree. Its consumption grants immortality."

920198.name: Sprout of Life
920198.desc: A young sprout emerging from the Seed of Abundance. Used to level up Traces moderately for Abundance characters.
920198.lore:
Radiating warmth, life and growth flourish around the place where it sinks its roots. Barren wastelands turn into luscious grass fields, withered plants rejuvenate and blossom, and springs burst through the ground to moisten the land.
As you get closer to it, your muscles and bones twitch and propagate with an unbearable itch.

"Life is unfailing where the soul abounds."

skill.name: Morn, Noon, Dusk, and Night
skill.descHash: Increases the wearer's Max HP by #1[i]% and Outgoing Healing by #2[i]%. When the wearer heals allies, record the amount of Outgoing Healing. When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes Additional DMG equal to #3[i]% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. The type of this Additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's. This Additional DMG is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.
